channel.title: Rune Player Killing
channel.description:
[size=18pt][img]http://i43.tinypic.com/okdcm0.gif[/img]Rune Player Killing[/size] Welcome to the Rune Player Killing's development thread. I am also using Eclipse instead of Notepad++.
Rune Player Killing: Rune Player Killing was started by me. [b]Based On:[/b]Demises' Edgeville PKing [b]Client:[/b]A 317 with a 474/508 gameframe with a GUI made by me.
I am looking for around 2 people to help me with this project. Current open spots: [b]Web Designer or Forum programmer[/b]: [code]Experience: Forum software you will use(vbulliten,smf,ect.):[/code] [b]Client programmer:[/b] [code]Experience:[/code] [b]Hoster:[/b] Will get 60% of donations with the other 40% going back to me. [code]What you will be hosting on?:[/code]
This will be soon updated. I do [b]not[/b] want any server programmers or anything else that is not listed above.
[size=14pt]The Team:[/size]
[ul][li]Stupit - All around programmer[/li] [li]I Vain I - Forum Creator[/li][/ul]
[b]Updates:[/b] [i]3/28/2010[/i] - The server was updated with all un-nessasary code in the client class and textHandler class was removed. The client was then updated with Demises' [b]SECKSY[/b] client background that he made for our server. [i]Found here:[/i] [url=http://i42.tinypic.com/jjbsk9.png]http://i42.tinypic.com/jjbsk9.png[/url]

item.title: Rune Player Killing
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

Well, i really don’t care what your using at the moment. But if i get accepted I will make SMF 2.0 RC3. I Vain I, if i get accepted, would you like to be an administrator to help me with it. As i couldn’t do everything in one day. But if i get accepted i will do as much as i can. So hurry up and tell me if im accepted or not. Please.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Player Killing
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

Yes im going to apply for every devolopment. If i get accepted into 1 i will cancel my post and application for here.

I never copied you…I have alot of experience with Forum/Website Administrating and creating. Also read your post again… you said you never were a GURU in any of the forum softwares…

[quote=“I Vain I”]Web designer:
Experience:I have worked with many different web scripts and know how to implement them into plain HTML. I have worked with XML, XHTML, DHTML, CSS, JavaScript, Php, Ajax, Mysql, and many other programming languages used in websites and forums software.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Player Killing
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

Experience: 7 Years of forum Creating. I’m basicly a GURU as on many support forum i have been called, SMF GURU!! , phpbb nerd, MyBB GURU & IPB NERD.

Forum software you will use(vbulliten,smf,ect.): SMF 2.0 RC3. The latest SMF forum. I can use vBulliten but i cannot pay for any expenses. If you get a domain i will forward the domain for you if you wish. I will also pay my friend if i need to because, i will be asking him for us using webhosting. He was given 2010 webhost of the year in the UK. So yea.

Read full topic
